actionConfiguration.body:
UPDATE products SET
		productName = '{{update_form.fieldState.productName.isVisible ? update_form.formData.productName : update_form.sourceData.productName}}',
		productLine = '{{update_form.fieldState.productLine.isVisible ? update_form.formData.productLine : update_form.sourceData.productLine}}',
    productScale = '{{update_form.fieldState.productScale.isVisible ? update_form.formData.productScale : update_form.sourceData.productScale}}',
		productVendor = '{{update_form.fieldState.productVendor.isVisible ? update_form.formData.productVendor : update_form.sourceData.productVendor}}',
		productDescription = '{{update_form.fieldState.productDescription.isVisible ? update_form.formData.productDescription : update_form.sourceData.productDescription}}',
		quantityInStock = '{{update_form.fieldState.quantityInStock.isVisible ? update_form.formData.quantityInStock : update_form.sourceData.quantityInStock}}',
		buyPrice = '{{update_form.fieldState.buyPrice.isVisible ? update_form.formData.buyPrice : update_form.sourceData.buyPrice}}',
		MSRP = '{{update_form.fieldState.MSRP.isVisible ? update_form.formData.MSRP : update_form.sourceData.MSRP}}'
WHERE productCode = {{data_table.selectedRow.productCode}};
